headline: Hormel Foods (HRL) Valuation: Navigating Margin Pressures, Executive Changes, and Fresh Legal Scrutiny
summary: Hormel Foods (HRL) is navigating a turbulent stretch after a fire at its Arkansas peanut butter plant, ongoing cost pressures, and the sudden departure of its CFO raised concern on Wall Street. See our latest analysis for Hormel Foods. Hormel’s share price has been under sustained pressure. Despite a recent bounce of 7.5% over the past month, its year-to-date share price return sits at -26% and the one-year total shareholder return is down nearly 25%. A string of tough headlines, including...

headline: Hormel Foods Readies for Q4 Earnings: Things to Watch for HRL Stock
summary: HRL faces strong retail demand heading into results, but rising input costs and slow pricing recovery threaten near-term margins.

headline: Unlocking Q4 Potential of Hormel (HRL): Exploring Wall Street Estimates for Key Metrics
summary: Looking beyond Wall Street's top-and-bottom-line estimate forecasts for Hormel (HRL), delve into some of its key metrics to gain a deeper insight into the company's potential performance for the quarter ended October 2025.

headline: Hormel Foods Announces 2025 Class of 10 Under 20 Food Heroes
summary: Hormel Foods Corporation (NYSE: HRL), a Fortune 500 global branded food company, today announced its fourth cohort of 10 Under 20 Food Heroes, recognizing the efforts of young people across the United States who are working to create a more transparent, secure, and sustainable food system.
